title: SKMatrix.Concat - EntryPointNotFoundException
body:
Hi!
I was able to get the latest source to build both on windows and mac.
"Added image assets for the Windows samples" 
hash:  22e9da955352c4e78fa2241c603b3759f6cf59bb

However, even thought the binding sources are up to date (Definitions.cs, etc.) and the skia/src/c/ stuff is in place as well (sk_matrix.cpp contains all required static functions) I get an "EntryPointNotFoundException" for the newly added methods of SKMatrix (concat, tryinvert, etc.) and my own one "SKImage.FromBitmap"

> An exception of type 'System.EntryPointNotFoundException' occurred in SkiaSharp.dll but was not handled in user code
> Additional information: Unable to find an entry point named 'sk_matrix_concat' in DLL 'libSkiaSharp.dll'.

So 
1. my sources are up to date
2. I did a "./bootstrapper.sp1 -target clean" and "-target libs" as well as "-target nuget" (on Windows and Mac OSX)
3. I add the new nuget to my solutions (Android and UWP - I did not test on iOS)
   and still I get this exception.

So I am obviously missing something. Can you give me a hint please?
